mbean.name: jboss:type=Service,name=SystemProperties
mbean.attribute: java.awt.headless=true dumbhippo.server.hajndiPort=@@hajndiPort@@ dumbhippo.server.features=@@serverFeatures@@ dumbhippo.server.disable.authentication=@@disableAuthentication@@ dumbhippo.server.email.disable=@@disableEmail@@ dumbhippo.server.bind.host=@@bindHost@@ dumbhippo.server.xmpp.port=@@jivePlainPort@@ dumbhippo.server.xmpp.adminuser=admin dumbhippo.server.xmpp.password=@@jivePassword@@ dumbhippo.server.http.port=@@tomcatHttpPort@@ dumbhippo.server.baseurl=@@baseurl@@ dumbhippo.server.web.version=@@webVersion@@ dumbhippo.server.crashdump.dir=@@crashdumpDir@@ dumbhippo.server.files.saveurl=file://@@filesavedir@@ dumbhippo.server.lucene.indexdir=@@luceneIndexDir@@ dumbhippo.server.aimbot.name=@@imbotScreenName@@ dumbhippo.server.aim.presence.key=@@aimPresenceKey@@ dumbhippo.server.downloadurl.windows=@@clientWindowsDownload@@ dumbhippo.server.downloadurl.windows.source=@@clientWindowsDownloadSource@@ dumbhippo.server.downloadurl.fedora5=@@clientFedora5Download@@ dumbhippo.server.downloadurl.fedora5.srpm=@@clientFedora5DownloadSRPM@@ dumbhippo.server.downloadurl.fedora6=@@clientFedora6Download@@ dumbhippo.server.downloadurl.fedora6.srpm=@@clientFedora6DownloadSRPM@@ dumbhippo.server.downloadurl.linux.tar=@@clientLinuxDownloadTar@@ dumbhippo.server.downloadinfo.windows.current=@@clientWindowsCurrent@@ dumbhippo.server.downloadinfo.windows.date=@@clientWindowsDate@@ dumbhippo.server.downloadinfo.linux.current=@@clientLinuxCurrent@@ dumbhippo.server.downloadinfo.linux.date=@@clientLinuxDate@@ dumbhippo.server.amazon.accesskeyid=@@amazonAccessKeyId@@ dumbhippo.server.amazon.secretkey=@@amazonSecretKey@@ dumbhippo.server.amazon.associatetag=@@amazonAssociateTag@@ dumbhippo.server.amazon.s3bucket=@@amazonS3Bucket@@ dumbhippo.server.yahoo.appid=@@yahooAppId@@ dumbhippo.server.ebay.devid=@@ebayDevId@@ dumbhippo.server.ebay.appid=@@ebayAppId@@ dumbhippo.server.ebay.certid=@@ebayCertId@@ dumbhippo.server.flickr.apiid=@@flickrApiId@@ dumbhippo.server.facebook.apikey=@@facebookApiKey@@ dumbhippo.server.facebook.secret=@@facebookSecret@@ dumbhippo.server.googleanalytics.key=@@googleAnalyticsKey@@ dumbhippo.server.adminconsole.enable=@@adminConsole@@ dumbhippo.server.newfeatures = @@newFeatures@@ dumbhippo.server.stealthmode=@@stealthMode@@ dumbhippo.server.slavemode=@@slaveMode@@ dumbhippo.server.userupdateinterval=@@userUpdateInterval@@ dumbhippo.server.summitgroupguid=@@summitGroupGuid@@ dumbhippo.server.newuserinvitationcount=@@newUserInvitationCount@@ dumbhippo.server.specialnewuserinvitationcount=@@specialNewUserInvitationCount@@
